title: Compact Day Details overlay spacing in full-screen day view

requirements.summary: Tighten non-editing Day Details overlay padding, row spacing, and line-height in the full-screen day view without changing font sizes, keeping it consistently compact on mobile and desktop.
acceptanceCriteria: In the full-screen day view (frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.tsx), when NOT editing, the Day Details overlay uses noticeably less vertical space than before.
No typography sizes are reduced (e.g., existing text-* size classes remain the same), and the compaction is achieved via reduced padding/margins/gaps and tighter line-height.
The compaction applies to: the overlay container padding, the "Day Details" title spacing, the detail rows spacing, and the Measurements subsection spacing (divider + section label + rows).
The overlay remains readable and does not overlap key controls (date overlay, edit/close buttons) on typical mobile and desktop viewport sizes.

file_operations.description: Adjust Tailwind classes for the non-editing "Day Details" overlay only: reduce container padding and internal vertical gaps/margins (title spacing, row spacing, measurements divider/label/rows), and add tighter line-height utilities (e.g., leading-tight/leading-snug) while keeping all existing text-* font size classes unchanged; ensure the overlay stays readable and does not conflict with top overlays across common mobile/desktop viewports.
